title: Organizational Learning Strategies at Trade Fairs: Network Building and Trust-Based Knowledge Sharing

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of organizational management and core business network concepts
context.additional_context: A training program for corporate managers/leaders emphasizing network strategies and trust-building mechanisms to facilitate organizational learning in trade fair environments.

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish and explain the characteristics of micro- and macro-level business networks in trade exhibitions.
Analyze the influence of strong/weak ties based on network types and propose organizational learning applications
Evaluate the impact of trust on knowledge transfer across networks and design practical implementation scenarios
Develop collaboration strategies for trade fairs based on social exchange theory
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
